JavaJam Coffee Bar

Work at JavaJam

Barista

As a Barista, you'll be the face of our coffee shop and responsible for our customers' experiences.

  • Prepare and serve coffee and tea drinks.
  • Adhere to recipes and presentations for food and beverage items.
  • Be punctual and able to observe regular and consistent attendance.

Hourly Wage: $12.00

Server

As a Server, you'll provide excellent customer service by taking orders, serving food and drinks, and removing dinnerware in a timely manner.

  • Take customer orders and deliver food and beverages.
  • Maintain a clean and sanitary work environment.
  • Work closely with management to meet revenue objectives.

Hourly Wage: $11.00
